#### results/README.md
```markdown
# Results Directory

Contains experimental outputs, visualizations, and analysis results.

## Subdirectories

- `training_curves/`: Training and validation loss/accuracy plots
- `confusion_matrices/`: Model performance visualizations  
- `lime_explanations/`: Explainable AI analysis outputs

## Generated Files

Results are automatically generated when running the notebook:
- Performance comparison tables (CSV format)
- Training history plots (PNG format)
- LIME explanation visualizations (PNG format)
- Classification reports (TXT format)
